## ViewportBuilderOptions.width property

Viewport width in characters.

**Signature:**

```typescript
width?: number;
```

## Remarks

Defines the horizontal size of the viewport. Defaults to 0.

When set to 0 (the default), the viewport has no width constraint and will use the natural width of the content. When set to a positive value, content will be clipped or wrapped to fit the specified width.
